column2: seeing that we did not get a proper breakfast on Sunday morning
column3: we decided to hit up Little Goat again on Monday.  As it wasn't too busy
column4: we were able to get seated right away on Monday.  Since we were also traveling on Monday
column5: we had our suitcases with us.  the hostess kindly offered to let us keep them at the hostess stand while we dined
column6: which I thought was a very nice touch.
